channel.title: Black screen when I log onto my account
channel.description: Hello, I play a 718 rsps and I was playing and I went to the mining skilling area. When I rotated my camera my account froze and I got a black screen. I am a moderator and I need to be on very soon. I have tried deleting the cache but it does not work. How do I fix this??? Please help !!!

item.title: Black screen when I log onto my account
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Because the client is stupid and it handles exceptions by shutting down the client.

Read full topic
item.source: Black screen when I log onto my account

Tell the owner his game is fucked up and hope to get admin?

item.description:
@adamgulka wrote:

when you log on get someone to spam tele you home, then it will go black, then you can log on fine.
